attributes.action: ensure MPs pay back any profit made from the sale of their second home as this was funded by expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the interest payment and home improvement costs of an MPs second home is funded through expenses, then any profit (or loss) made on the sale should be reimbersed to the government. MPs should not make a dual gain from both expense funding of a second home and the increase in value that the expense claim gives to the second home when they subsequently sell the property.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
